welcome:
Hello!
I am your virtual assistant for car insurance. My goal is to help you understand the options, compare rates, and find the best insurance for your car. Let me know your requirements or questions, and I will help you make the right choice!

insurance.start: Please provide a photo of the front side of your passport.
insurance.passport_back: Please provide a photo of the back side of your passport.
insurance.technical_passport: Please provide a document confirming your car's identification (front side).
insurance.technical_passport_back: Please provide a document confirming your car's identification (back side).
insurance.confirm_documents: Documents confirmed, the insurance cost is $100. Please confirm.
insurance.reject_documents: Let's try again. Please provide a photo of the front side of your passport.
insurance.reject_price: Sorry, but we only have one price.
